input.sentences: we all gathered at the church for the baptism .
the baby 's grandpa got up to make a speech .
me and my sister got our picture taken
i also took another with my brother .
output.sentences: Yesterday we gathered in the church for Beverly's baptism.
Grandpa gave a moving speech about baby Beverly.
Grandpa doesn't like taking photos but he gave in this time and posed for the camera.
Unlike grandpa, my sister is a ham and loves getting her picture taken.
Beverlys baptism made my brother so happy.
